name: YouKilleLe Ninja / Ukulele Ninja
description:
An action puzzle game where you possess people as a ninja with a ukulele and the power of music. Please play the strings responsibly. 

This was our Global Game Jam 2018 entry.

Controls: 

  • MOVEMENT - WASD or Arrow Keys 
  • JUMP - Space bar 
  • OPEN DOOR/FLIP SWITCH - E 
  • TRANSMIT - Q
  • CANCEL POSSESSION - Z
  • RESET LEVEL - R

Credits: 

Michael Marney-Brusstar - Sound

Nicholas Gyde - Programming

Merlin Benneth - Artist (Player, NPCs)

Aim Diab - Artist (Backgrounds, environment)
